channel.title: [Urgent?][Please Help] Crystal Chest [Dementhium][639]

item.title: [Urgent?][Please Help] Crystal Chest [Dementhium][639]
item.dc:creator: @M.I.A M.I.A.
item.description:
@M.I.A wrote:

Hello, i seem to be having issues when i attempt to begin enabling crystal chest, the load works in ItemOnObjectHandler.java it’s just, how would i go about having it begin the chance item in CrystalChest.java?

I have added:

import org.dementhium.content.minigames.CrystalChest; import org.dementhium.content.misc.ChanceItem;
Inside ItemOnObjectHandler.java

I was told that this would work:

but it doesn’t…

So, i am obviously lost and perhaps confused? If somebody can just tell me what i’m doing wrong or a way to fix it that would be wonderful, for the compiling error scroll down:

Compiling CrypticDev... src\org\dementhium\net\packethandlers\ItemOnObjectHandler.java:102: cannot find symbol symbol : variable CRYSTAL_CHEST_REWARDS location: class org.dementhium.net.packethandlers.ItemOnObjectHandler player.getInventory().addItem(new ChanceItem(CRYSTAL_CHEST_REWAR DS)); ^ src\org\dementhium\net\packethandlers\ItemOnObjectHandler.java:102: internal err or; cannot instantiate org.dementhium.content.misc.ChanceItem.<init> at org.deme nthium.content.misc.ChanceItem to () player.getInventory().addItem(new ChanceItem(CRYSTAL_CHEST_REWAR DS)); ^ 2 errors Complete Press any key to continue . . .

Here is my CrystalChest.java:

[code]package org.dementhium.content.minigames;

import org.dementhium.content.misc.ChanceItem;
import org.dementhium.model.Item;

/**
*

  • @author Wolfey
    */
    public class CrystalChest {

    private static final ChanceItem[] CRYSTAL_CHEST_REWARDS = new ChanceItem[] { new ChanceItem(new Item(995, 2000), 27), new ChanceItem(new Item(1631, 1), 100), new ChanceItem(new Item(1969, 1), 27),
    new ChanceItem(new Item(441, 150), 100),
    new ChanceItem(new Item(454, 1), 7),
    new ChanceItem(new Item(2363, 3), 9),
    new ChanceItem(new Item(556, 50), 9), new ChanceItem(new Item(558, 50), 9), new ChanceItem(new Item(559, 50), 9), new ChanceItem(new Item(557, 50), 9), new ChanceItem(new Item(554, 50), 9), new ChanceItem(new Item(555, 50), 9), new ChanceItem(new Item(560, 10), 9), new ChanceItem(new Item(564, 10), 9), new ChanceItem(new Item(562, 10), 9), new ChanceItem(new Item(561, 10), 9), new ChanceItem(new Item(563, 10), 9),
    new ChanceItem(new Item(985, 1), 3), new ChanceItem(new Item(987, 1), 3), new ChanceItem(new Item(995, 750), 3), };
    }
    [/code]

I’ve been searching for this fix, quite a while now… If somebody can help me that would be wonderful, and you’d definately make my day…

Thank you for your time, and seeming consideration.

Have a Great day.
